entities.name: firenze
entities.description: A centaur who is banished and warns Harry about Hagrid's attempt.

entities.name: hagrid

entities.name: forest
entities.description: The location where Hagrid has troubles.

relationships.description: Firenze warns Harry about Hagrid's attempt.
Firenze is banished and avoids going near the forest.
